thread.title: Celebrity Big Brother bosses drop shock bombshell following Ray J and Brandon Block's departure
thread.title_full: Celebrity Big Brother bosses drop shock bombshell following Ray J and Brandon Block's departure

author: Nicola Agius
title: Celebrity Big Brother bosses drop shock bombshell following Ray J and Brandon Block's departure
text:
Celebrity Big Brother bosses drop shock bombshell following Ray J and Brandon Block's departure What will the remaining housemates have to say about THIS? Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Ray J unhappy about how shock CBB exit was addressed on show Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe 
Celebrity Big Brother bosses have made a huge announcement. 
Tomorrow, two new famous faces will be entering the house to replace Ray J and Brandon Block. 
Producers dropped the bombshell during an advert aired during a break tonight. 
A voice revealed the celebs are in for a "weekend from hell" and that the show would turn into "a f fight for survival". Brandon Block quit the series on Wednesday 
And while two new housemates are set to enter tomorrow, one of the current celebs will still be losing their place on the show in the first elimination of the series. Read More Angie Best 'issued with warning' from Celebrity Big Brother bosses 'amid fears for housemates' 
Brandon decided to quit the show yesterday, explaining that he didn't quite feel himself in the house. 
Ray J on the other hand left a few days earlier and no explanation was aired as to why. Ray J walked out of the house earlier this week (Photo: Rex Features) 
However, during a chat TMZ about his exit, he revealed he’d been suffering extreme pain for around three days because of a cracked tooth. He claimed it got so bad, he passed out. 
The musician alleged producers removed him from the house because of the pain, but wouldn’t let him return once he’d been treated. 
"I end up in the hospital for 45 minutes, they got me a some nutrition and I ate some McDonald's and I'm cool, I'm literally fine, I'm ready to go back in the house but they won't let me back in," he said. Two new housemates will join the show on Friday (Photo: YouTube/Big Brother UK) 
"I'm really hurt by it because I felt like I was doing well. I was having such a good time. I felt like I was connecting with the British fan base, the British audience." 
He's since begged producers to reconsider and let him return, and has retweeted one viewer asking everyone to start a petition. 
Ray J – who famously starred in a leaked sex tape with Kim Kardashian in 2003 - was rumoured he received a $1 million pay check to take part in the show, which would make him CBB’s highest paid contestant of all time. 
Tune in tomorrow from 9pm, Channel 5 to watch Celebrity Big Brother 's first live eviction with a shock twist and new celebrity housemates! Like us on Facebook
